azurerm_eventhub_namespace_disaster_reco.description: Manages an Disaster Recovery Config for an Event Hub Namespace.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Disaster Recovery Config. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

namespace_name.description: Specifies the name of the primary EventHub Namespace to replicate. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Disaster Recovery Config exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

partner_namespace_id.description: The ID of the EventHub Namespace to replicate to.

alternate_name.description: An alternate name to use when the Disaster Recovery Config's name is the same as the replicated namespace's name.

wait_for_replication.description: Should the resource wait for replication upon creation? Defaults to `false`.

id.description: The EventHub Namespace Disaster Recovery Config ID.

create.description: Used when creating the EventHub Namespace Disaster Recovery Config.

update.description: Used when updating the EventHub Namespace Disaster Recovery Config.

read.description: Used when retrieving the EventHub Namespace Disaster Recovery Config.

delete.description: Used when deleting the EventHub Namespace Disaster Recovery Config.
